body:
### Welcome to Meena Hospital.
Meena Hospital offers a full continuum of diagnostic, therapeutic and surgical orthopaedic services for adults and children with bone, joint or connective tissue disorders.  We have earned the trust of generations of patients based on our track record of delivering superior clinical outcomes.

### Doctors on Board
* #### Dr. Nitin Dhande (DNB Ortho, DOrtho, MAMS, LLB)
* #### Dr. Mukesh Dhande (MS Neurology, DNB General Surgery)

### Our Specialties
* Total Knee Replacement
* Shoulder Joint Replacement
* Total Hip Replacement
* Percutaneous Spine Surgery


### Support or Contact

Behind S. T. Stand
